verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> also came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> you dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have eyes <S%H5869><s%> to see, <S%H7200><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> not; they have ears <S%H241><s%> to hear, <S%H8085><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> not: for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

Therefore, you son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prepare <S%H6213><s%> you stuff <S%H3627><s%> for removing, <S%H1473><s%> and remove <S%H1540><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> in their sight; <S%H5869><s%> and you shall remove <S%H1540><s%> from your place <S%H4725><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> in their sight: <S%H5869><s%> it may be they will consider, <S%H7200><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they be a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

Then shall you bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> your stuff <S%H3627><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> in their sight, <S%H5869><s%> as stuff <S%H3627><s%> for removing: <S%H1473><s%> and you shall go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%> in their sight, <S%H5869><s%> as they that go <S%H4161><s%> forth <S%H4161><s%> into captivity. <S%H1473><s%>
Dig <S%H2864><s%> you through the wall <S%H7023><s%> in their sight, <S%H5869><s%> and carry <S%H3318><s%> out thereby.

In their sight <S%H5869><s%> shall you bear <S%H5375><s%> it on your shoulders, <S%H3802><s%> and carry <S%H3318><s%> it forth <S%H3318><s%> in the twilight: <S%H5939><s%> you shall cover <S%H3680><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> that you see <S%H7200><s%> not the ground: <S%H776><s%> for I have set <S%H5414><s%> you for a sign <S%H4159><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And I did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> as I was commanded: <S%H6680><s%> I brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> my stuff <S%H3627><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> as stuff <S%H3627><s%> for captivity, <S%H1473><s%> and in the even <S%H6153><s%> I dig <S%H2864><s%> through the wall <S%H7023><s%> with my hand; <S%H3027><s%> I brought <S%H3318><s%> it forth <S%H3318><s%> in the twilight, <S%H5939><s%> and I bore <S%H5375><s%> it on my shoulder <S%H3802><s%> in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>
And in the morning <S%H1242><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> has not the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to you, What <S%H4100><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> you?

Say <S%H559><s%> you to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> burden <S%H4853><s%> concerns the prince <S%H5387><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that are among <S%H8432><s%> them.

Say, <S%H559><s%> I am your sign: <S%H4159><s%> like as I have done, <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> to them: they shall remove <S%H1473><s%> and go <S%H3212><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>

And the prince <S%H5387><s%> that is among <S%H8432><s%> them shall bear <S%H5375><s%> on his shoulder <S%H3802><s%> in the twilight, <S%H5939><s%> and shall go <S%H3318><s%> forth: <S%H3318><s%> they shall dig <S%H2864><s%> through the wall <S%H7023><s%> to carry <S%H3318><s%> out thereby: he shall cover <S%H3680><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> that he see <S%H7200><s%> not the ground <S%H776><s%> with his eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

My net <S%H7568><s%> also will I spread <S%H6566><s%> on him, and he shall be taken <S%H8610><s%> in my snare: <S%H4686><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> him to Babylon <S%H894><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans; <S%H3779><s%> yet shall he not see <S%H7200><s%> it, though he shall die <S%H4191><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> toward every <S%H3605><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that are about <S%H5439><s%> him to help <S%H5828><s%> him, and all <S%H3605><s%> his bands; <S%H102><s%> and I will draw <S%H7324><s%> out the sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them.

And they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when I shall scatter <S%H6327><s%> them among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them in the countries. <S%H776><s%>

But I will leave <S%H3498><s%> a few <S%H4557><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of them from the sword, <S%H2719><s%> from the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and from the pestilence; <S%H1698><s%> that they may declare <S%H5608><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their abominations <S%H8441><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they come; <S%H935><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> with quaking, <S%H7494><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> your water <S%H4325><s%> with trembling <S%H7269><s%> and with carefulness; <S%H1674><s%>

And say <S%H559><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H127><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and of the land <S%H776><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> They shall eat <S%H398><s%> their bread <S%H3899><s%> with carefulness, <S%H1674><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> their water <S%H4325><s%> with astonishment, <S%H8078><s%> that her land <S%H776><s%> may be desolate <S%H3456><s%> from all <S%H4393><s%> that is therein, <S%H4393><s%> because of the violence <S%H2555><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein.

And the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are inhabited <S%H3427><s%> shall be laid waste, <S%H2717><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> shall be desolate; <S%H8077><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is that proverb <S%H4912><s%> that you have in the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The days <S%H3117><s%> are prolonged, <S%H748><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> vision <S%H2377><s%> fails? <S%H6><s%>

Tell <S%H559><s%> them therefore, <S%H3651><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> I will make this <S%H2088><s%> proverb <S%H4912><s%> to cease, <S%H7673><s%> and they shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> use <S%H4912><s%> it as a proverb <S%H4911><s%> in Israel; <S%H3478><s%> but say <S%H1696><s%> to them, The days <S%H3117><s%> are at <S%H7126><s%> hand, <S%H7126><s%> and the effect <S%H1697><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> vision. <S%H2377><s%>

For there shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> any vain <S%H7723><s%> vision <S%H2377><s%> nor flattering <S%H2509><s%> divination <S%H4738><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For I am the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> I will speak, <S%H1696><s%> and the word <S%H1697><s%> that I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> shall come <S%H6213><s%> to pass; <S%H6213><s%> it shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> prolonged: <S%H4900><s%> for in your days, <S%H3117><s%> O rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> will I say <S%H1696><s%> the word, <S%H1697><s%> and will perform <S%H6213><s%> it, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying. <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> they of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> The vision <S%H2377><s%> that he sees <S%H2372><s%> is for many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> to come, and he prophesies <S%H5012><s%> of the times <S%H6256><s%> that are far <S%H7350><s%> off.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> There shall none <S%H3808><s%> of my words <S%H1697><s%> be prolonged <S%H4900><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> more, <S%H5750><s%> but the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> shall be done, <S%H6213><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
